title: Mephistopheles: An Escape Room
description:
Embark on a captivating journey at our Escape Room experience, meticulously crafted to ignite creativity among students. This immersive adventure blends mystery with technical prowess, challenging participants to solve intricate puzzles and decode messages to break free from the clutches of a self-aware AI. Engage your intellect and collaborative spirit as you navigate this labyrinth, fostering a unique fusion of problem-solving and technical skills.

Unleash your creativity and push the boundaries of your capabilities in an unforgettable quest for freedom. Are you ready to unravel the enigma and escape the realm of the self-aware AI? Join us and explore the endless possibilities!

title: Metaverse Marvels - Embracing Web3 Revolution
description:
Explore the future of the internet and immerse yourself in the Metaverse Marvels event. 

Embrace the Web3 revolution as we delve into the latest advancements in decentralized technologies, blockchain, and virtual reality. Join us for insightful discussions, hands-on experiences, and a glimpse into the evolving landscape of the digital world.

Be a part of this transformative journey and discover the endless possibilities that the Metaverse holds.

title: IPL Auction
description: Round 1 - In the first stage all the teams will compete in an IPL based quiz with the top 20 teams being promoted to the next round.

Round 2 - In this round, there will be a Higher-Lower game based on the stats of players in IPL T20 2023 matches. After this round, the top 10 teams will advance to the next round. Each question in this round will have images and names of 2 cricket players, along with a specific stat of one player. Then, the teams will have to guess whether that particular unknown stat of the second player is higher or lower.

Round 3 - Auction: Each team will be given a purse balance of 100cr, with which they have to build a team of 15-17 players from a designated pool of 160 players. Each player is assigned a rating based on their stats in IPL T20 matches in 2023. Teams with the highest ratings in their starting 11 will be crowned champions.

title: Orion's Watch
description:
üë©üèΩ‚ÄçüöÄ Heyy there Space Enthusiasts!!

 Get ready to dive into the cosmos with Abhiyanthriki'23 as we proudly present - Orion's Watch, a thrilling guided telescope observation session.

üî≠An introductory session on selecting, using and extracting information from telescopes, and an observation session where you get to peer into the depths of space, witness stunning planets, and discover celestial wonders!

title: Whodunnit?
description:
Whodunnit?' is the ultimate detective game that challenges teams of 2-5 members to unravel a mysterious case using a set of evidence and clues. 

Each team has 15 minutes on the clock to showcase their detective skills and solve the mystery. The team that solves the case in the shortest time will be declared the winner, earning them a cash prize of Rs. 1000. 

Join us for an exhilarating challenge and test your investigative¬†prowess!

title: Arduino Arcade Bash
description:
Onboard into a comprehensive two-round program that seamlessly blends education and competition. Participants partake in an immersive workshop, delving into the intricacies of Arduino-based arcade game development. Covering coding, hardware integration, and game design, this session equips attendees with essential skills.

In the Challenge phase unfolds, tasking participants with crafting innovative games. Adjudicated on creativity, functionality, and user engagement, projects are evaluated by discerning judges. This event promises a professional platform for skill enhancement, collaboration, and the showcase of ingenuity in the realm of Arduino game development.

title: Create with an E
description:
Create with an E is an E-Waste Art Gallery Competition where E-waste will be distributed to participating teams, challenging them to harness their creativity to transform these discarded materials into an innovative and aesthetically pleasing art gallery.

This event not only serves as a platform for artistic expression but also promotes sustainable practices by repurposing e-waste.

title: Techy Showdown: Mastering the Digital Arena
description:
Techy Showdown is a venue for tech enthusiasts to showcase their technological and marketing skills. The competition aims to identify all-rounders in the technology field by testing participants' knowledge across a wide array of disciplines.

Contestants engage in rounds of debate, technical showdowns, group discussions, and presentations to validate their points and demonstrate their expertise

title: Sculptoria
description:
Join us for an exciting workshop called Sculptoria, where you'll get hands-on experience with 3D printing, laser cutting, and CNC machines. Discover the basics of these cool technologies, create your own 3D-printed objects, design intricate patterns with laser cutting, and explore the precision of CNC machining.

Whether you're a beginner or an enthusiast, Sculptoria is the place to unleash your creativity and gain valuable skills in the fascinating world of digital fabrication.

title: Scenius 2.0 (Gaming Experience)
description:
Scenius 2.0 presents an engaging technical game featuring four rounds centered around general knowledge in the field of civil engineering. Participants will embark on a journey that includes rounds such as JAM and Bridge Bust, where they will challenge their skills by constructing a bridge. This immersive event culminates in a virtual reality experience. 

Immerse yourself in breathtaking virtual worlds, from heart-pounding adventures to serene escapes. Feel the rush of excitement as reality blurs, and your senses are transported to new dimensions. We extend a warm invitation to participants from all engineering branches to partake in this thrilling competition, fostering collaboration and innovation.

title: Scenius 2.0 (workshop)
description:
Scenius 2.0 presents an engaging technical game featuring four rounds centered around general knowledge in the field of civil engineering. Participants will embark on a journey that includes rounds such as JAM and Bridge Bust, where they will challenge their skills by constructing a bridge. This immersive event culminates in a virtual reality experience. 

Immerse yourself in breathtaking virtual worlds, from heart-pounding adventures to serene escapes. Feel the rush of excitement as reality blurs, and your senses are transported to new dimensions. We extend a warm invitation to participants from all engineering branches to partake in this thrilling competition, fostering collaboration and innovation.

title: HackS'US - Edition III
description:
Join the excitement as RSET IEDC in association with Abhiyanthriki '23 unveils the thrilling
HackS'US - Edition III an All Kerala 24-hour Inter-College Hackathon. 

Compete for internship opportunities, startup incubation, and more. Benefit from exclusive mentorship and special training sessions from communities and alumni.

Elevate your skills and teamwork for a chance at the impressive ‚Çπ1,30,000 prize pool.
Prepare for excitement with a lineup of entertaining programs to keep you engaged throughout the event.

title: Ethical Hacking Workshop
description:
üí°What to Expect: Join us for an immersive Ethical Hacking Workshop featuring Mr. Ajal from Offenso Hackers Academy. 

Gain insights into: 
Hands-on hacking demos, 
Pro tips on ethical hacking 
Networking with cybersecurity pros.

Don't miss the cybersecurity revolution!  #EthicalHacking #TechEvent

title: Toyota Hybrid Workshop
description:
Uncover secrets of green mobility with us!

üõ† Hands-On Hybrid Fun: Explore hybrid tech up-close and personal!

ü§ñ Tech Talks: Hear from experts on the future of eco-friendly driving.

üåç Sustainability Chat: Discuss the impact of hybrid tech on our planet.

title:
QuickQuery
 Seek and you shall find!
description:
Are you ready for the Ultimate Google Challenge?

QuickQuery

Where time dances to the rhythm of your intellect. Two electrifying minutes, 15 questions that weave through the tapestry of history, currents of affairs, and the intricate threads of tech. No lifeline, no chat bots - just your raw Google skills!

Unleash the abstract brilliance within!

title: Flash a Fractal
description:
Eager to showcase your photography prowess? Look no further!

Join us for 'Flash a Fractal' a photography extravaganza that promises to be a shutterbug's delight.Get ready to snap your way to glory at 'Flash a Fractal,' where every click tells a story.

Let's freeze the moments together!

title: Start Camera Action
description:
Get ready to unleash your creativity and cinematic flair! üåü

See you at Start Camera Action - where your story begins! üöÄ 

#StartCameraAction2023 #ShortFilmCompetition

title: Rhythmic Resonance
description:
Join the captivating 'Rhythmic Resonance' at Tech Fest Abhiyanthriki, RSET, on December 16th. 

This independent event invites eastern musical bands to showcase their talent alongside skilled musicians from various colleges. Unleash your best performance and seize the opportunity to win an impressive prize pool of Rs.17k!

title: Disco Divas
description:
Dance into the spotlight at our Spot Choreo showdown!

Unleash your creativity in this vibrant, quick-paced dance event that's all about choreographic brilliance!

title: Blitzbanter (Tech Debate)
description:
Competition Highlights:

- 10 teams, five members each

- Four thought-provoking rounds

- Evaluation based on technical knowledge, argument strength, teamwork, and adaptability

title: manAIge
description:
Are you aspiring to build a thriving career in management? Then here's your opportunity!

As part of ABHIYANTHRIKI 2023, we present to you the opportunity to gain valuable industry insights through our upcoming session. 

 ‚ú® manAIge ‚ú® 

 How to Build a Successful Career in Management.

title: County Cricket
description:
County cricket is a kind of cricket game where six is not allowed.

Hitting six will be considered as out.

Only fours and singles are allowed. 

The bowler has to bowl from inside a box and can't step out of the box.

title: Maestro de Circuito
description:
Maestro De Circuito serves as the ultimate arena where teams showcase their electronics expertise through competitive challenges. 

These tasks assess their knowledge and application capabilities, with the top-performing teams advancing through rounds. The team that successfully completes the final challenge wins.

title: 3s Football
description:
Get ready for a kickin' good time at this football showdown where teams shall vie for victory!

Here, it will all come down to teamwork, skill, and the sheer joy of playing. 

Join us for a day where football reaches new heights of intensity and camaraderie!

title: ElectroHunt
description:
Step into the pulse-pounding realm of Electro-hunt - a dynamic 3-hour tech fiesta spread across lab, corridors and our main building.

Brace for three electrifying challenges: quiz, hunt, and circuit connection.

Assemble your dream team of 2-4 and chase the thrill for a chance to snag the 3k prize pool!

title: Circuit Race
description:
The Circuit Race: Accelerate into the heart of innovation with our Circuit Race event! 
This adrenaline-fueled challenge kicks off with a rapid-fire quiz, testing your circuit savvy, followed by a hands-on implementation round where you'll harness provided components to craft and execute your circuit masterpiece. 
Feel the surge of excitement as creativity meets technical skill in a high-stakes race to engineer the most innovative circuit. 

Get ready to push the boundaries, spark ingenuity, and surge ahead toward electrifying triumph!

title: Uncharted Cipher's Quest
description:
Dive into an electrifying journey into the captivating realm of Cipher's Quest! 
Immerse yourself in the thrilling challenge of decoding, debugging, and problem-solving across three exhilarating rounds.Just like a small-field symphony of ability and strategy, each team member plays a crucial role in unraveling complex codes and navigating the intricate web of challenges. Brace yourself for a fast-paced, dynamic experience where individual ingenuity and teamwork collide in the quest for victory.
Cipher Quest is not just a tech adventure; it's a pulse-pounding symphony of wit and skill. Do you have what it takes to conquer the quest and emerge victorious?
